attributes.action: ensure that the outgoing Speaker of the House of Commons, Mr. Michael Martin, is not granted a peerage or any other honour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Michael Martin has presided over a House of Commons which has been revealed to be corrupt. He has compounded matters by blocking publication of MPs' expenses as well as indulging in other dubious  practices as have been revealed in the media.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
